downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Tools Documentation: Modifier with Visual Basic for Applications (VBA)
downloadDescription: This documentation describes how to use Modifier with VBA, which is a customization tool used to modify the appearance and functionality of Microsoft Dynamics GP windows.
detailsSection:
You can use this page to download the following documentation components.

Help files
This download includes the following help files:
  • Modifier Help (Mod.chm): Includes the Modifier User's Guide in HTML Help format, with additional help for Modifier windows.
  • VBA Help (VBA.chm): Includes the VBA Developer's Guide in HTML Help format.


Guides
This download includes the following files in PDF format:
  • Modifier Quick Start (ModifierQuickStart.pdf): Includes an overview of Modifier and specific lessons.
  • Modifier User's Guide (ModifierUsersGuide.pdf): Explains how to modify forms and the user interface. Also describes the Forms dictionary, how to control access to modifications you have created, and how to make global modifications.
  • VBA Developer's Guide (VBADevelopersGuide.pdf) Explains how to program windows, window fields, grids, and reports. Also describes how to store application data and distribute projects, and includes reference information about properties and events for objects.
systemRequirementsSection: • To view the PDF files, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the guides or help files.
  2. Save the file to your computer.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Dynamics GP Developer Center on MSDN
